title: Chelsea news: Scout to watch Ivan Perisic during Inter vs Roma this Sunday | Metro News
text:
Chelsea scout to watch Ivan Perisic during Inter’s clash with Roma gossip Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 8:36 am Chelsea scouts will watch Ivan Perisic during Inter’s clash with Roma. (LightRocket/Getty Images) 
A Chelsea scout will be present during Inter’s clash with Roma on Sunday to watch Ivan Perisic, according to reports. 
Tuttomercatoweb claim that the Croatia international remains on Antonio Conte’s shortlist ahead of the summer transfer window. 
And the Premier League leaders are keen to see how the 28-year-old gets on against Roma, who are currently second in Serie A and eight points in front of fifth-placed Inter. 
Perisic is valued by Inter at around €35 million – €40m (£29.4m – £33.6m). Perisic remains on Chelsea’s shortlist. (LightRocket/Getty Images) 
Perisic has been one of the key figures for Inter this season, scoring seven goals and registering two assists in 23 Serie A appearances so far.
